description:
Depop is the most fun way to buy and sell straight from your pocket.

Sell your things by simply taking a picture. Follow your friends and see what they buy, sell and like. Discover the best things from the community. Open your little shop now.

• ELLE UK: Top 50 Apps
• The Next Web: London’s Top 10 Most Loved Apps
• Wired Italy: Top 100 Apps of the Year
• Featured in Vogue Italy and Cool Hunting
 
SELL ITEMS FASTER THAN EVER

• Just take a photo to sell things from your phone  
• Share straight to Facebook and Twitter
• Chat to potential buyers and be featured on profiles
• Get paid instantly in Depop through PayPal
 
DISCOVER THE BEST THINGS BEFORE ANYONE ELSE
 
• Explore fashion, art, electronics, accessories, vintage, music and more
• Shop for sales, luxury labels or the latest fashion and styles
• Follow, like, search and share the items you love
• Buy securely in Depop through PayPal, credit card or debit card

“It’s the best of Etsi, Instagram and Facebook put together” - App Store Reviewer

“Love the app, great content and simple easy to use design. I buy items from my favourite sellers and sell my own in minutes” - Another App Store reviewer

“Absolutely fantastic app, very easy selling platform to use and great fun browsing products! Would definitely recommend!!” - And another App Store reviewer
releaseNotes:
Just a few bug fixes.

As always, if you have any issues get in touch with us support@depop.com or on Facebook and Twitter @depopmarket.
